content: Jessica Rowe was turning heads on Wednesday afternoon.

The media personality made an appearance at the Fairfax & Roberts Mother's Day event and showed off her incredible figure. The 52-year-old stunned in a black cropped top with feather detailing, which flaunted her toned tummy. The television star added a matching mini skirt with the same multi-coloured detailing, which showed off her trim fishnet-clad pins. Jessica opted for a glowing makeup look with a dark purple lipstick and finished her look with dangling statement earrings.

Also turning heads was Kylie Gillies, who chose a sleek navy blue suit with white legged trousers. The 56-year-old added a pair of nude heels and chose a glowing makeup look with a nude lipstick. She posed alongside Edwina Bartholomew, 39, who was on trend in a checked silk blouse and pencil skirt.  Bachelor runner-up Bella Varelis, 28, went braless under a slinky black shirt and added a grey mini skirt and YSL belt.

Melissa Doyle was a vision in cream, opting for a pale dress that sat close to her slender figure. The television star, 53, added a pair of studded black heels and chose a clean makeup look with a pink lipstick.  She posed alongside her daughter Natalia who looked pretty in a pink frock and designer heels in a beige tone with gold detailing.
